name: Maven Assembly Plugin
description:
Maven Assembly Plugin

NOTE:When filing a new bug report, please try to attach a sample project that can express the incorrect behavior, and include instructions for building the project. This can drastically reduce the time taken to reproduce, debug, and fix your issue. Ultimately, it may mean the difference between getting your bug fixed in the next release, and waiting until we have the time to devote to in-depth investigation.
